description: Core business domains of the RWA platform.

domains.description: Handles user/entity registration, KYC/KYB, authentication (Keycloak), and authorization (RBAC/ABAC).
Manages the lifecycle of digital assets: creation (minting), issuance, and corporate actions.
Core trading functionality: order book, matching engine, market data. Initially focused on primary issuance.
Handles Delivery-vs-Payment (DvP) logic, integration with banking rails, and transaction reconciliation.
AML/CFT monitoring, rule engine, sanctions screening, and regulatory reporting.
Manages wallets and keys, likely integrating with an HSM or external custodian.
